Name: Temple of Xiala
About the game: Explore an ancient civilization, and master the Linkube, an artifact that controls space and time. Control gravity to overcome obstacles and reach the next level. Temple of Xiala is a smart puzzle game where you control gravity and move boulders in slots to clear a path to the next level. The game contains 20 challenging levels for you to solve.
